item.title: Spacing Galerie Grid
item.description:
Hey guys,
I`m using the Axis 2 Theme and was wondering: My first gallery page has two sets. Now, is it possible to space only two sets so that they are centered. I can't seem to find a way to do that. At the moment it`s right centered...which just looks totally off.
Thanks!
Melanie

item.title: Responsive design in combination with forwarded domain
item.description:
Dear all
I have installed koken on my website www.lehner.info/ml. When I open this site it opens the - desktop design when I open it from my notebook and it opens the - mobile design when I open it from my smartphone. So everything works as intended.
But I have also configured a domain forward from my domain www.martinlehner.com which redirects to www.lehner.info/ml where the domain name www.martinlehner.com remains. In this case the desktop design appears even if I open it from my smartphone.
Does anybody know why koken doesn’t recognise the smartphone correctly in this case? Any idea how to fix this issue?
Thanks a lot, Martin

item.title: Get rid of the "download" link in Axis?
item.description:
Hey there,
just changed my theme from Regale to Axis and was wondering if there was a way to get rid of the Download Button underneath the images? Like here for example: http://koken.sophiesaller.de/preview.php?/albums/tini-uli-1/content/cu-best-123/
Thanks in advance and kind regards,
Sophie

item.title: Celine Bag to find a luxurious
item.description:
Trip Preparation Tips In our Choosing and Booking section, you can locate information about finding lodging and flights. For example, you can [b][url=http://www.celinehandbagsonline.com/celine-trapeze-c-25/]Celine Trapeze Bag[/url][/b] read about how to find cheap hostels or how to find a luxurious villa overseas, how to book tickets for entertainment, and, of course, how to locate and book flights online.
Our Gearing Up and Health Safety sections provide you with tons of advice on what to take with you depending on the destination, how to avoid a shark [b][url=http://www.celinehandbagsonline.com/celine-mini-tie-c-29/]Celine Mini Tie Handbag[/url][/b] attack, and any other travelrelated topic in between.
Everything you need to know about [b][url=http://www.celinehandbagsonline.com/celine-phantom-c-24/]Celine Phantom Cabas[/url][/b] maps and destinations you can find in our Guides and Maps section. Besides obvious advice on how to read a map, there are also articles about using an ATM abroad and about entertainment in different parts of the world.
The Packing section shows you how to pack enough for your vacation and still be within airlines' security and weight guidelines. This section also advises you on the luggage restrictions and how to find this information. Our Paperwork section deals with everything related to documents that you need for your travel, from passports to visas.
The site's Planning and Trips sections show how to successfully plan your vacation, whether it's a day trip or a month in New Zealand. These sections give you advice on everything from fixing a broken case handle to using international calling cards. If you're planning a trip of any kind, our website is the perfect onestop shop for any travel information you [b][url=http://www.celinehandbagsonline.com/]Celine Bag[/url][/b] may need!
http://www.valentinoshoesa.com/valentino-sandals-c-13/ http://www.valentinorockstudsale.com/valentino-tote-bags-c-9/ http://www.lhbon.com/celine-micro-luggage-c-13_19/ http://www.airjordanmvp.com/nike-kobe-8-c-102/ http://www.lhbon.com/burberry-hobo-c-193_196/

item.title: Lightbox - Cross-fading without black phase
item.description:
In the lightbox the cross-fading from image to image looks bad. Switching to the next image fades the current image to black and then the new image fades in. It is possible to eliminate the black phase? It would be nice, if the current image could fade directly into the next image without black phase.
This unpleasant image cross-fading I can see in the lightbox of all demo themes. Is there any solution?

item.title: Boulevard-Theme Aspect-Ration wrong
item.description:
Hey there,
somebody noticed, that the image-aspect (ratio) in the feature-slide is not the same as in the album-slides in boulevard theme? why? am i missing something? i mean people look em.. wide.. inspected the lens stuff etc and saw, that the difference between featured and album slides is.. yes aspect..!
So anybody knows how to fix this?
cheers Chris

item.title: Disable Splash Screen for Mobile
item.description:
Hello!
Regarding Madison 2 Theme, I was wondering if there was a way to disable the splash screen front page for mobile, so that it only shows up on desktop.
It doesn't work too well on phones (the pictures slide, as opposed to dissolve), plus the logo disappears. Mobile looks far better as single-column Grid (if you want that full-screen look).
Thanks!

item.title: Italics
item.description:
Hello,
On my site, I present among others photos of animals and plants using the Latin scientific name of species. The rule is that this name should be in italics.
If I put the names between tags (....) in the title and caption fields of the Library, the names are italicized in the title, but not in the caption. Furthermore the tags appear as such in the browser tabs.
Is there a way to change this?

item.title: Change navigation buttons on lightbox in Madison2
item.description:
Hello,
I changed the background colour of the lightbox to white (via CMS). Is it possible to change also the colour of the navigation buttons. The problem is that they are almost invisible (very light grey) on the white background.
Thank you in advance for your answer.

item.title: Own js and css in Template
item.description:
Hi, i like to use mmenu for Template Elemantary.
I put js file in folder js and css file in folder css.
In header.html i insert:
But it doesn`t load. I like to have this css and js on all sites in this template.
THX

item.title: Copy to Home and Album pages
item.description:
Hi,
How do I add some introduction copy to the top of the home page and Album page?
I'm using the Elementary theme.
Thanks Jason

item.title: Regale 2 photo display question
item.description:
Hello,
I recently purchased Regale 2. I would like to show the photo's in my blog in a similar way as you show in the example site on: http://madison.koken.me/essays/
I would like to show my blog photo's in Regale 2 exactly the same as the example. I mean with the boxes arounf the photo and title. Can you tell me if this is possible and how?
cheers Danny Zuurbier

item.title: Boulevard - Mobile browser - horizontal bug?
item.description:
Hey Koken team! First off thank you for continuing to build and support such an amazing platform.
http://okiave.com/albums/c0ec19e8b744ffe8ae9852879ab362a9/
I'm using Boulevard and noticed that on my iPhone6 chrome browser that the gallery will treat the last image of the album as a new block element instead of running it inline with the others.
When I flip the phone to vertical view this issue doesn't exist. Hope this feedback is of use. Thanks

item.title: boulevard theme favorites - option to enlarge photo by clicking on it?
item.description:
Hello,
I am using the boulevard theme and displaying my "favorites" for the main page. The default setting seems to be that when you click an image it makes the page scroll to the right.
I am wondering if there is an option to change this, so if you click on an image it simply enlarges the it? I would be happy with only the scroll bar and the navigation buttons as options to scroll left and right if this meant i could have this option. Or, is there some other way it can be an option to see photos bigger using the favorites?
Thanks!!
Lilly

item.title: Axis2 Theme - Picture display
item.description:
Hello,
I apologize, if this turns out to be a typical beginner's question.
I bought Axis2, created sets (the typical thing - landscape, people, vacations...) and a number of albums under each set. I can manage to display all albums of a set on one screen (finally I found the grid parameter), but when I click on a certain album, all pictures from that album appear one below the other (list view ?), not as I wish 6, 9 or 12 on a page. Even after hours and a lot of coffee, I can't find the magic switch to turn this on.
The functionality is shown on the Axis2 reference at http://timwrate.com.au/albums/, so I'm sure, there must be a way...
Any advice would be very much appreciated!
Best regards, Mario

item.title: lightbox too transparent
item.description:
Hello,
Is there a way to make the lightbox background less transparent? According to the environmental/computer light, one can see partly the page underneath the lightbox background. This is a kind of disturbance when looking at the pictures in the lightbox.
N.B. I am using Madison 2 on a MacBook Pro with Retina.
Thanks in advance for your answer.

item.title: Installing a Theme
item.description: I want to install your Elementary theme. I click on Install and I go to the login page. I am logged in already. How do I install the Elementary theme? My installation is: http://jkpx.com/koken/.

item.description: in put photos themes

item.title: lazy loading pulse theme repertoire
item.description:
Hi,
I use repertoire theme feature for my albums page http://cpixel.fr/sets/bw-1/ When a page is open, I cas see in network dev tools that all content is loaded. How to add lazy loading for pulse ?
Thx

item.title: Boulevard Favorite Page?
item.description:
Hello! Reading through this page solved 90% of my issue: http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/questions/8412365-boulevard-featured-content
.... But is there any change to the favorites page where a click on the image would take the user to the Album where it's placed?
Thanks!

item.description:

item.title: Boulevard, viewport doesn't work in galleries?!
item.description:
I just noticed that the viewport on gallery-sites doesn't really work as intended, the site seems like it's too far zoomed out, pictures are small and even the title is smaller than text pages or album pages.
Is there any way I can make sure the gallery sites are on the same zoom level like the rest text-pages?
Open these sites on a mobile device and you'll see what I mean: Gallery: http://ivansuta.ch Text: http://ivansuta.ch/pages/ueber/

item.title: Koken:If only through Javascript
item.description:
Hello, am I wrong, or it appears that koken:if works by hiding pieces of html through Javascript? Is there any way to do that on server side?
Thanks, J

item.title: Can't install theme
item.description:
On a test server I used to buy and activate the theme Axis 2 When the site began at the main site and install the theme, then the system displays a message https://yadi.sk/i/Zxw5L5SUiB9iP
When approve the authorization request?

item.title: Individual templates
item.description:
Hello,
I am using Madison 2. Is it possible to make "individual templates" per album? For example one showcased in list and one showcased in grid?
It doesn't seem to be supported by theme by default, is it still possible to do it with custom CSS ?
Thank you in advance for your reply
Baz

item.title: Regale 2 - change order of HTML elements
Chastain Theme Settings Missing
item.description:
I am trying to set up my Chastain Theme to use the triptych layout of my cover photos but the option is missing in my site settings box. ( I can send a snapshot) Under the template tab the only options I get are for elements (lightbox, show title, show caption). I also wanted to set up my albums so they are viewed in a grid pattern but so far all my photos are in one column. www.headshotsbykemp.com
Any help with this would be great!!!

item.title: Theme purchase for test domain
item.description:
Hi, I'm setting up Koken on a test domain and want to purchase the Regale 2 theme.
I note that when I check out, it recognises the domain, new.matsmithphotography.com
When I'm ready to take the site live, will this theme work on my non-test domain, matsmithphotography.com? Can I purchase the theme now then switch the domain later?
Regards
Mat

item.title: Chastain Theme Image Manipulation
item.description:
Hello,
I would like my images to be left as they are, no scaling, no resharpening or anything. Where can I fix that and what exactly do I have to specify?
Regards
Joachim

item.title: OxyGen 1.9.3 available for download!
item.description:
My custom theme that I use for my personal Koken site is now ready for download!
This theme has up to now been "exclusive" for visitors to Koken Community Support: but now we want to share the "love" with everybody! ;) :)
Documentation can be found here: http://varoystrand.se/sidor/oxygen/ Downloads can be found at: http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=32 Source code: https://github.com/BlackSkorpio/OxyGen
Hope some of you find it useful, if you do: don't hesitate to tell us by adding your site to our "Showcase your site" listing
---------------------- Regards, Bjarne Koken Community Support - http://kokensupport.varoystrand.se/

item.title: Axis 2
item.description:
hello koken team,
is it possible to align the menue and title left and not in the center in the axis 2 theme ?
thanks,
ralf

item.title: Orginal AXIS Theme
item.description: I do not create a backup before i try to change something now nothing works ... Is there an Way to geht the original Axis theme back ? Where i can download it i cannot find the theme in the store.

item.title: can't access the store
item.description: Hi guys - I can't access the store or store/plugins or store/templates menu on the site. It defaults back to /library all the time Any suggestions?

item.title: Regale: Image resizing on album preview?
item.description:
Hi there,
is it possible to change the way images are being displayed on album previews? I understand one can change the aspect ratio of that preview image but I have not found a way to resize an image. I mean, if your subject matter is not directly in center, most preview images look horrible. Even if I change the aspect ratio to 1:1 it still won't look alright...
For instance, please check out " http://maxkissler.com/sets/menschen/ " to know what I mean.
Is there a solution?
Thanks, Max Kißler

item.title: two themes in one?
item.description:
Hi,
I like the Regale 2 very much, but I'd love to have a horizontal (Boulevard style) gallery as well for my travel photography. The splash full-screen is good, but not what I'm looking for

item.title: Album thumb width in Regale 2
item.description:
Hi,
Is it possible to change the Album grid so that the height would always be the same? Now it scales the thumbs by the width and the horizontal pictures gets very small.. http://nicktulinen.com/albums/mari-perankoski/
otherwise. Very good work! Thank You!

item.title: Title Display under Image in Axis 2 doesn't fade
item.description:
Hi, On the Landing Page (Axis 2), the Title Display under my Images doesn't fade, while the images do fade. That creates a strange rupture in the flow of the display. Is there anything I can do to make the title appear later or fade as well?
You can look at it here: www.teresamarenzi.com
Thanks! Teresa

item.title: Dimension / Ratio in Slideshow (Axis 2)
item.description:
Hi,
I am working on my page. My images will be presented with a slide-show. Unfortunately, the ratio / dimension of the slide-show in AXIS 2 can not be changed. There is only a crop (landscape, portrait, ...). If I use "none" the image is shown as a whole, but there is a big margin on top and bottom.
How can I solve this problem?
Alex

item.title: Showing multiple albums on the "home" page of Madison 2 theme?
item.description:
Hello,
Love Madison 2 theme. Quick question, how do I configure my site:
http://bobandmatt.com/
To show all of the Albums, and not just all of the entries for the first Album as it displays now?
I'm looking to align to this example:
http://robtmann.net/
Since I like how it will display all the Albums when it's responsive to tablet/mobile. With my site right now, all of the Albums get hidden in the flyout nav — so it only looks like I have a few things.
Here is a screengrab of how I have the directory setup. My guess is it's a problem here?
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/11368113/Screen%20Shot%202015-06-24%20at%2012.07.20%20PM.png
Thank you! Bob

item.description:
Hi! I already addressed to you to give me back the money for purchasing the theme "madison2." Your answer was as follows: Bjarne Varöystrand May 27, 2015 07:32AM EDT You need to send an email to: support@koken.me with your request
Regards, Bjarne
I wrote to you on e-mail the request, but no one answers me !!! What is the problem ?? Give me back my money !!! I refuse to buy madison2

item.title: Overly compressed/garbled thumbnails in Regale 2
item.description:
Hi! I'm having issues where some of my thumbnails in Regale 2 are not displaying correctly; out of twenty or so, three or four will be overly compressed and garbled. The full resolution seem to be fine. I'm using ImageMagick 6.7.9-10, but it appears to happen with ImageMagick 6.7.9 and GD Bundled. Could it be something to do with the original JPGs that I'm uploading?
Thanks!

item.description:

My site is www.chetank.com Iam seeing that the social networks icons are not aligned and also I have enabled share links, but that is also not displayed. Iam an amateur in this field, please help me
Thanks & Regards Chetan

hey!
how can I add some space between groups of links in the navigation as in the default theme screenshots in the store.

Marcel

item.title: New Themes Not Showing in Themes List

The interface says that the themes have installed correctly, and I can look on my host and see a folder for the theme has been created. However they do not show in the list of themes available for use so I cannot enable them. So far I have tried clearing "koken/storage/cache/api" to no effect.

Brice

item.title: Thum dimensions in Regale 2
item.description:
Hello,
Is it possible to change the gallery settings in Regale 2 so that the thumbnails would be always the same height. Now i believe it's the other way around and the thumbs are always presented in the same width.
I'd love this modification

item.title: Grid template
item.description:
Hi there, I'm currently using the slideshow to display the photos of each album i have, using the Axis theme. I tried to add a grid layout to one of the albuns, and it seems like it's not possible to have a separate template for an album/page. It just changes across the entire website.
Is there any option to customise the layout of an album/page? using the grid template instead of the slideshow ?
Thanks, Thales

item.title: Store photos in cloud
item.description: Good day! mosthosting does not give a lot of disk space, tell whether there is a plan to support or store photos in the cloud, for example google drive, dropbox etc?

item.title: align pics
item.description:
i use boulevard theme. But everypics are not on same live
the last one is under the line.. what can i do ?
you can see on gallery hashka.fr/photo/albums/flynt/
thanks

item.title: Theme designs- quirks and bugs
item.description:
I have high hopes (and wishes) for what you folks are doing. Thanks! I've been using a few of the free themes on my site http://jrileystewart.com for several weeks. Always looking for that perfect theme, and am willing to pay for it, but seemingly simple quirks in the themes I've tried so far is keeping me from committing to a purchase. Just not confident that I'll not be stuck with the same limitations I see with your free themes.
-Found Elementary theme to meet most of my needs. Also have published using Axis. I like that I can turn off all the BS I don't want to show (like EXIF, date captured, etc -- no one cares about that stuff and professional looking sites don't include such). I really like the layout of Repertoire and Madison, but I can't turn off the BS with those templates. Wish I could. - Also, when I tried to use an image as header for the Repertoire template, it placed the image BELOW the links. What's with that? (I'm using Chrome, maybe it's an issue only with that browser, don't know).
If you can, it might be a valuable improvement to enable turning on/off ALL of the text fields for EACH template. Currently enabling/disabling seems to be all over the place, depending on which theme you use. If you could confirm that the paid templates give me that flexibility, I'd be willing to buy some of them. Thanks for listening. Jim

item.title: Madison 2 - Center site title to content
Madison 2 - Show Title/Caption on thumbs on mouseover
item.description:
Hey there,
I'm using Koken and the Madison 2 Theme - it's great!! One question:
is it possible to show Titel and Caption on the Thumbnails on mouseover?
It is possible in Regale, and it would be great if it would be available for Madison, too. Thanks,
Dominik

item.title: Download image in Regale 2
item.description:
Hi,
I am pretty sure that there was an option to enable downloads within the lightbox. But I am not sure if this is also feasible with Regale 2 theme. At least, I cannot find it.
Could you help me on this?
Thx lot, Thilo

item.title: madison 2 !!!
item.description:
Bjarne Varöystrand May 22, 2015 07:19AM EDT Hi Max. Please keep questions in english...
Yoo can only use the theme on one domain: if you want to use it on another site, you need to deactivate it on site #1 to be able to use it on site #2.
Hi! Please give me back the money for the theme "madison2." !!!

item.title: Chastain image link/ligthbox link
item.description: When I click on image in album with "Link images to lightbox" setting enabled I get empty lightbox. If I disable this setting I get just empty page. Can you help me, please?

item.title: Boulevard problem with horizontal slide (using Chrome)
item.description:
Hi there,
I've been using Koken for a few months, quite happy with it. I installed the Boulevard theme because of the cool horizontal slider.
But...and I don't know when this started -because I noticed this just a few days ago-, the horizontal slider isn't working properly in Chrome anymore. The last photo drops vertical instead of staying with the rest on one horizontal line. It looks fine using Firefox and IE, but it's still very annoying since this wasn't going on earlier. I installed the theme again, but that wasn't the solution.
It seems this problem existed in the past but has been fixed. Now it seems has returned, maybe after the updates on the themes?
Thanks for your response!

item.title: Contact Form
item.description: Several of my clients have been asking for a contact form to ask basic questions instead of booking a free consultation appointment. Is there anyway Koken can either have a plug in or directions/instructions or even ccs codes for koken users to add a contact form? I am on the edge of switching to another provider due to this issue! I paid to have my page customize and still not able to get the contact form. Also I just purchased a theme that I would like a refund on. The Receipt ID is489CBFM. Thanks!

item.title: Boulevard theme error?
item.description:
Hi Koken,
I use Boulevard theme for my site: lianggono.com
I chose Boulevard because its capability to show an endless slide of images beautifully. But recently, I came across my 'Works' page the last image on slideshow stacked up at the bottom of the screen, and it's ugly. (see preview) http://lianggono.com/works/elle-decoration-2/
This behavior could kills Boulevard's main strength, could you guys help me on this?

item.title: madison 2
item.description: Добрый день! Я купил у вас тему "madison 2" можно ли ее использовать для двух разных сайтов?

item.title: Chastain on mobile
item.description:
Hi - I'm having the same issue addressed here: http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/questions/1032827-chastain-on-mobile
Was a solution found? The logo/image is off center to the right when viewed portrait on mobile. It appears to be due to the width of the page being wider than the screen of the device, meaning the centre of the page is to the right. Is there CSS code I can apply to fix or is this problem not css related?
www.unitedbyform.com is the site. we tried on both and iphone and android and encountered the same issue.

item.title: Regale 1
item.description:
Dear Support!
I wanted to use the theme regale as one of my friends is using it and I really like the layout and the style of the theme. Unfortunatelly regale 1 is not avaliable anymore on the store. After looking through some older forums and questions, I have found a link, provided by one of your colleagues, and downloaded it. After properly installing it the theme shows up in my theme gallery, but after trying to applying it, it wont load. On the preview page I only see a black screen. Is there any way for me to be able to use this theme, or only the paid version, regale 2 is avaliable?
Thank you in advance!

item.title: Repertoire custom logo alignment
item.description: I'm having problems getting the custom image logo to vertically align to match the bottom of the primary menu - how do I best do this? I've kind of hacked it together with a margin-top: 13px; custom css that is applied to header.top div.row div.four.columns nav ul.k-nav-list.k-nav-root but that doesnt seem to always match exactly depending on browser and device page width

I am building a custom theme and want to detect when the current content object in an album is a gif. I can get the filename, but I can't think of way to test the filename suffix using Koken lens tags.
Is this possible, any helpers greatly appreciated?
Regards Mike

item.title: Main Page slideshow in Repertoire does not diplay pictures at their native size.
item.description:
Hello.
Your article about editing theme slideshows says : "Expand" automatically expands and contracts the slideshow's height to present all images at their native size.
The native size of my pictures in the library are 433 x 650 / 650 x 433. But the slideshow displays them at larger dimension and the quality suffers from upscaling.
Is there any way to display them at there native size with the slideshow?

item.title: Theme Customization
item.description: Where can I find someone with experience to hire to customize my theme?

item.title: title attributes and filenames
item.description:
Hello,
I am using Boulevard Theme. I was wondering if there is a way I can set the imported images to automatically add the file name / alt tag to the caption. This would be great as I have large volumes of images to upload and adding the image titles for each image is not convenient at all for my workflow...
Are the theme template files available to edit incase inserting some php into the span would be the best solution?
Any ideas would be great to know !
Thank
david

item.title: Translation possibilities
item.description:
Currently I have a mixture between english tamplate and german content.
Look on http://zugegensein.de/essays/2015/05/hommage-a-barbara/
At the bottom of the page you read "see more", but just two lines below "Kategorien" because I'be translated this in the backend.
The same with featured images: http://zugegensein.de/featured/das-buch/ You can see newer featured older for navigation on top of the page.
I need more options for translation!
Best regards, Marc

item.title: Image releflection Boulevard image strip
item.description:
Hey!
I am using the Boulevard theme (it's great and Koken is very easy to use for my client, thank you for that!). I do have a question/request. Is it possible to have a reflection beneath the images of the Strip? I've seen it at some Wordpress themes. Thanks in advance!
Greets,
Joost

Hi,
I have a Problem with the way axis displays the website name. When I look at my website on a cell phone everythins is fitted to the resultion of the screen. Except the website name. This is cut of on the right side,

item.title: I nee the refund!
item.description:
Koken was suggested by a friend and after take a look on that I installed it with enthusiam. Immediately purchased the Regale 2 theme but after installing it I discovered it doesn't work. Probably due to limitattions on my host for what concerning loopback connection. Brad asked me the login data to investigate on it but never heard back anything else. As was impossible to build my photo site with koken I was forced to turn on another solution. Then I asked for a complete refund because the theme is unusable on my host. After several requests by email and than through paypal I haven't received any reply. I believe its a really unprofessional beahvior.
Damiano

item.title: Set Covers
item.description: Is it possible to have a set cover as an image that is not in the set? I have diptychs in my set, but would ideally like just one image from a diptych as the cover image. I'm using Axis 2. Thanks!

item.title: Custom CSS
item.description:
Hi there,
First I would say how pleasant is Koken CMS. In few hours, I can do what I previously do in days...
I'm trying since this morning to customize CSS in Regale 2 theme. Everything is fine, except h1 title font size. I can't change the font size of cover h1. I can change line space, line height, color, not the size. With firebug, I can see that font size is set to a strange 65.4166666666667px size.
here is a link: http://didier-oberson.ch/photography/sets/architecture/
Thanks for your help
Didier

item.title: Madison 2 - Frontpage images not correct loading

Sometimes images on Madison 2 Homepage will not load correctly. They will be displayed very small. I have this issue tested on the current versions of chrome and firefox.
Any help would be great, Tim
